revised_title: Photographic Records of the Kew Declinometer and Decennial Variation of Magnetic Disturbances
tldr: The author analyzes the photographic records of the Kew Declinometer from 1858 to 1861, confirming the decennial variation of magnetic disturbances and its correlation with solar activity. The study provides insights into the progression of the decennial variation and the importance of maintaining consistent observations for further understanding of these phenomena.
